DOC.brief_summary: All patient undergo elective sub-acute PCI screen MULTIPLATE test clopidogrel low-responsiveness receive 600 mg clopidogrel day . A cut value previously establish . Only low-responders Multiplate value cut value include study . The patient randomize either clopidogrel 150 mg daily Prasugrel 10 mg ( age > 75 og bodyweight < 60 kg 5 mg ) daily 30 day procedure . Follow 30 day PCI another MULTIPLATE test perform . Primary endpoint : Platelet inhibition ( MULTIPLATE ) 30 day intensify antiplatelet therapy . Clinical endpoint bleed complication ( GUSTO , TIMI ) treatment , major adverse cardiac event ( MACE ) 30 day collect report study size allow formal statistical analysis The study end 30 day follow visit patient continue clopidogrel 75 mg daily another 11 month ( study relate )
DOC.brief_title: Prasugrel Versus Double Dose Clopidogrel Treat Clopidogrel Low-responsiveness After PCI
DOC.criteria: PCI stenting Multiplate hepADP > 70 U despite clopidogrel load need vit K antagonist woman childbearing potential breastfeeding woman Planned surgery within 6 month Intolerance clopidogrel , prasugrel aspirin previous stroke
